name: You miss, you lose!
description:
Entry for Trijam #42

Developed in 3 Hours for Trijam #42. Theme: "Straight from underground".

  • Made with Godot Game Engine
  • In Engine Time was under 3 Hours
  • Spooky Theme
  • 2D Wave-Based Shooter

You are locked in a Cave, with Ghost's coming from all sides!

You're only ability is to shoot, but if you miss one shot you will die!

Credits:

Main Loop: https://soundimage.org/looping-music/ "Arcade Fantasy"

Jump Sound: https://freesound.org/people/Prof.Mudkip/sounds/422087/

Shoot Sound: https://freesound.org/people/MusicLegends/sounds/344310/

I hope you will enjoy the game, as much as I enjoyed making it :)
